summary: Amid concerns that the Coast Guard's workload has outpaced its staffing, GAO has some recommendations that would help address these issues. For example, the Coast Guard still has to assess workforce needs for most of its units, including some with increasing demand (e.g., marine inspectors). We have recommended updating the Coast Guard's workforce assessment plan with timeframes and milestones for completion. In this statement for...
title: Coast Guard: Increasing Mission Demands Highlight Importance of Assessing Its Workforce Needs
